TopicTitle: Olympus Space Agency: A history (Let's Play)

Articles.Content:
Welcome to the home of the Olympus Space Agency.

Here the stories of the brave Jebediah, Bob, and Bill Kerman, along with many other brave kerbonauts who will be shot into space in the name of research, development and interplanetary exploration. This history is kept by a series of videos, the first of which can be found here:

If you would like to see more of the history, feel free to like, comment and subscribe or leave a message here.

Have a fantastic day!
